The youngest person ever to win a JUNO Award, Universal R&B recording singer-songwriter and host of BET's "106 and Park", Keshia Chanté is the perfect example of a young talent whose life in the spotlight has been built on musical chops, passion and drive.

  See more

Keshia is currently the host of BET's wildly popular daily show "106 & PARK," where she has interviewed the First Lady Michelle Obama, Grammy Award winning artist Mariah Carey, Snoop Dogg and a host of other A-list talent. Her musical career has boasted eight Top 10 radio singles and numerous accolades including a JUNO Award for R&B/Soul Recording of the Year and six Canadian Urban Music Awards. In 2012, Keshia took Japan by storm, hitting #1 on the Billboard charts with her album Night & Day.

As a judge on The Next Star, Keshia's looking for hopefuls with the technical chops to make amazing music!

  See less

A punk-rocker, record label exec, writer, producer and A&R legend, Edmonton-born Mark Spicoluk lives and breathes music. As a teen, he shared the stage with international sensations Avril Lavigne, Sum 41 and played in his own band Closet Monster.

  See more

When he was just 16, Mark started indie record label Underground Operations. Since then he's helped discover, develop and launch many artist's careers such as Lights, Stereos and Protest the Hero. Mark's eye for talent landed him a gig with KISS frontman Gene Simmons' label and the impressive position as Sr. A&R for one of Canada's leading record labels, Universal Music Canada where he became one of the youngest head of A&R in the entire country! Now, Mark spends his time running TWO of his very own music companies.

He's just a really cool music wiz in the music biz. That...and he has a weird haircut.

  See less

Sweet, charming and proud "Newfoundlander" Tara Oram is thrilled to be back for another season of music mentorship. Make no mistake, Tara also promises to bring a brand new season of fun and shenanigans to the judging panel.

  See more

As a reality TV star, Tara can relate to our young hopefuls as they embark on the journey of a lifetime. Tara's top-6 finish on Canadian Idol in 2007 caught the attention of the music biz, eventually landing her the starring role on the CMT show The Tara Diaries. Since then, Tara has collaborated with A-list songwriters, including sharing the stage with Taylor Swift.

Tara is looking for a knockout voice and the stage presence to match - she knows the Next Star is out there and she can't wait to meet them!

  See less
